498210.name: Red vs. Blue: The Blood Gulch Chronicles (Volume 1)
498210.description: In the distant future, ten soldiers battle for control of the least desirable piece of real estate in the known universe- a box canyon in the middle of nowhere. Red vs. Blue chronicles the misadventures of two hapless armies as they wage a war that few understand and no one wants to fight.

categories.description: 原生支持 Steam 控制器
